short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert a Spark Page into a printer-friendly mode for easy printing to paper or PDF

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds an option to the right-click menu that allows you to convert a Spark Page into a simpler, printer-friendly mode so that it can easily be printed to paper or converted to PDF.

This can be useful when you want to:
- Save a snapshot of a Spark Page at a particular time to PDF, for example a teacher might do this when their student's assignment is due.
- Convert a Spark Page to a PDF for a simple backup of the text contained within it.
- Convert a Spark Page to a PDF for offline viewing
- Print a Spark Page in order to submit it to the copyright office
